bibl.title: The Plotting Scene in Euripides' "Alexandros": An Interpretation of Fr. 23, 23A 23B, 43 Sn (cf. Hypothesis, 11. 23-25).
bibl.note: P. Stras. Inv. 2342-2344 (= Pack2 432). P. Oxy. LII, 3650. - Commente un choix de fragments, en réponse à: David Kovacs, On the Alexandros of Euripides, HSCP 88 (1984) pp. 47-70.
bibl.seg: Huys Marc, The Plotting Scene in Euripides' "Alexandros": An Interpretation of Fr. 23, 23A 23B, 43 Sn (cf. Hypothesis, 11. 23-25).
